item.title: Cheatsheet for command line
item.author: Author
item.description: usefull tools for linux command line a. Make terminal cool, install OhMyZsh 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # install zsh sudo apt-get install zsh # ubuntu # change default shell to zsh chsh -s /usr/bin/zsh # install ohmyzsh sh -c "$(wget https://raw.github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh -O -)" source ~/.zshrc b.
